Text.Page:
I trust you've seen by now that this island is no normal place. The ghilliedhus, the structures to the south, and further on there's the...well let's just say you'll be no use to us if you're dead.

Making the island safe for future researchers is your top priority now. Junia over there will teach you how to be a better .

Welcome! You look like you're ready to learn new skills.

How can you learn new skills? It's simple! Every time you reach an even level, you can visit a master or instructor of the corresponding class and look through the skill menu and learn the skill!

All right now, let's try it. The new skill for s is called the "Whirlwind I". Try this one.

Your path to glory lies before you: earn more experience and get better skills.

You like that Whirlwind I skill? You become a moving circle of damage when spinning. Later in your career it'll be even more useful!
